content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_axe
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 27, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a golden axe, I need to craft 3 gold ingots, which requires smelting 3 gold ores. The first ore is located in slot 23, so I will smelt it into the first empty slot (11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 23 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 23 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 16 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a golden axe, I need to craft two sticks and three gold ingots. Since there are already three gold ingots in the inventory, I just need to craft two sticks. To craft a stick, I need to place two bamboo blocks vertically in the crafting table, so I will move one bamboo block to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1
